subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The arrival of Heyward, a well-rounded outfielder who has helped Atlanta and St. Louis reach the playoffs, could signal a shift in power in the National League, and possibly in the majors.
snippet: The arrival of Heyward, a well-rounded outfielder who has helped Atlanta and St. Louis reach the playoffs, could signal a shift in power in the National League, and possibly in the majors.
